name: clam
description:
Entry for GDEX 2021 Game Jam

Use WASD to move around and hold the key for continuous movement.

Use 0-9 to purchase items in the store as they appear.

Find The Clam.

Installation / Running

To run this game, please install LÖVE for your platform. Then simply run clam.love using that program.

For Windows users, download the Clam-Windows-v0.0.1.zip file, unzip it to your preferred location, then double click Clam.exe.
